text.content: Merchant has shipped or is ready to ship goods/services.

rich_text.plain_text: Merchant has shipped or is ready to ship goods/services.

text.content: Merchant is fully integrated with Payment Gateway and Acquirer Bank.

rich_text.plain_text: Merchant is fully integrated with Payment Gateway and Acquirer Bank.

text.content: Funds are deducted from Customer’s account.

rich_text.plain_text: Funds are deducted from Customer’s account.

text.content: Merchant receives settlement via Acquirer Bank.

rich_text.plain_text: Merchant receives settlement via Acquirer Bank.

text.content: Both Merchant and Customer are notified with the reason.

rich_text.plain_text: Both Merchant and Customer are notified with the reason.

text.content: Merchant confirms shipment/delivery of the order.

rich_text.plain_text: Merchant confirms shipment/delivery of the order.

text.content: (authorization code, amount, order reference) to Payment Gateway.

rich_text.plain_text: (authorization code, amount, order reference) to Payment Gateway.

text.content: Payment Gateway forwards request to Payment Processor.

rich_text.plain_text: Payment Gateway forwards request to Payment Processor.

text.content: Deducts held funds from Customer’s account.

rich_text.plain_text: Deducts held funds from Customer’s account.

text.content: Approves capture and transfers funds to Acquirer Bank.

rich_text.plain_text: Approves capture and transfers funds to Acquirer Bank.

text.content: Issuer Bank → Card Network → Payment Processor → Payment Gateway → Merchant.

rich_text.plain_text: Issuer Bank → Card Network → Payment Processor → Payment Gateway → Merchant.

text.content: Merchant captures only part of the authorized amount.

rich_text.plain_text: Merchant captures only part of the authorized amount.

text.content: Remaining funds may still be captured later (if allowed).

rich_text.plain_text: Remaining funds may still be captured later (if allowed).

text.content: Merchant submits multiple capture requests under same authorization.

rich_text.plain_text: Merchant submits multiple capture requests under same authorization.

text.content: Each capture deducts a portion until total = authorized amount.

rich_text.plain_text: Each capture deducts a portion until total = authorized amount.

text.content: System retries or Merchant retries later.

rich_text.plain_text: System retries or Merchant retries later.

text.content: Acquirer refuses settlement (merchant compliance, exceeded limits).

rich_text.plain_text: Acquirer refuses settlement (merchant compliance, exceeded limits).

text.content: Issuer or Network flags potential fraud/chargeback.

rich_text.plain_text: Issuer or Network flags potential fraud/chargeback.

text.content: Merchant must review or request Customer to re-pay.

rich_text.plain_text: Merchant must review or request Customer to re-pay.

text.content: Capture must be traceable to the original Authorization (via auth code).

rich_text.plain_text: Capture must be traceable to the original Authorization (via auth code).

text.content: PCI DSS and local compliance (Napas rules, SBV regulations).

rich_text.plain_text: PCI DSS and local compliance (Napas rules, SBV regulations).

text.content: Capture must occur in real-time (few seconds response).

rich_text.plain_text: Capture must occur in real-time (few seconds response).

text.content: Logging and audit trail required for reconciliation.

rich_text.plain_text: Logging and audit trail required for reconciliation.
